mapper.select: select b.id, b.userId,b.category, b.title, b.content, b.written_date, b.updated_date, b.viewCount, b.tags, b.imgs, b.videos, u.nickname from board as b inner join user as u on b.userId = u.id where category = #{category} and b.title like '%공지사항%' order by b.id desc limit 30 ;

select b.id, b.userId,b.category, b.title, b.content, b.written_date, b.updated_date, b.viewCount, b.tags, b.imgs, b.videos, u.nickname from board as b inner join user as u on b.userId = u.id where category = #{category} and title like '%이벤트%' ;

select b.id, b.userId,b.category, b.title, b.content, b.written_date, b.updated_date, b.viewCount, b.tags, b.imgs, b.videos, u.nickname from board as b inner join user as u on b.userId = u.id where b.id = #{id};
